channel.title: Need a program can do a video like this.
channel.description:
Any program that can blend two video into one like this? Gameplay+camera= Gameplay with my reaction
Example: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mjgc59wionw[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch#!v=aOBlrpDsKfU&feature=related[/url]

item.title: Need a program can do a video like this.
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
two ways of fixing that, First is updating. The older installs of fraps had that problem. Version 2.9.8 or better works great. Second option is to run a wire from audio out to the line in port on your computer because the line in/microphone recording still worked on the older fraps.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a program can do a video like this.

item.title: Need a program can do a video like this.
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Adobe premier
Sony Vegas
Adobe After Effects
T@B

That’s all i can think of. I’m not sure with the fraps thing. You already do the obvious thing and re-install?

item.title: Need a program can do a video like this.
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
I don’t have a webcam, but a hand held digital camera that able to record a video.

I also have a problem on fraps, that it record no sound even i enable “record sound”

item.description:

Well not with Webcam Max, but something else.

item.source: Need a program can do a video like this.

item.title: Need a program can do a video like this.
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
Webcam Max can do it live. Set the primary source to desktop, pip is set to webcam. From there you can either record the output, stream live using USTREAM/justin.tv or you can use the live recording feature on youtube.

Read full topic
